snippet: The Yankees shortstop’s backhand flip to nail Jeremy Giambi at home plate during Game 3 of the 2001 American League division series helped turn the tide after two home losses.
abstract: New York Yankees prepare to face the Oakland Athletics in what could be Derek Jeter's final appearance at O.co Coliseum; arena was where Jeter performed stunning backhand flip to tag out Jeremy Giambi in 2001, play that helped shift the tide of the American League division in the Yankees' favor; other New York Yankees news noted.
lead_paragraph: The Yankees shortstop’s backhand flip to nail Jeremy Giambi at home plate during Game 3 of the 2001 American League division series helped turn the tide after two home losses.

headline.main: Jeter’s Return to Oakland Recalls a Defensive Gem
headline.print_headline: Jeter’s Return to Oakland Recalls a Defensive Gem
